abstract: Backstage with Mumbai-born Naeem Khan, as he unveils his Spring Collection.
snippet: Backstage with Mumbai-born Naeem Khan, as he unveils his Spring Collection.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts

lead_paragraph: It's less than an hour before Naeem Khan's runway show at Lincoln Center showcasing his Spring 2012 collection, and I'm standing backstage with the 54 year-old designer. Photographers scurry around us shooting the clothes, which are still on hangers, while a team of stylists apply the finishing hair, makeup and nail touches on the leggy models. The mood is hectic, but Khan himself is incredibly calm.
